title: How to Make Skittles Cookies

steps.headline: Cream the butter, sugar, vanilla and eggs in a bowl.
steps.description: Mix well until mixture is beaten until creamy.

steps.headline: Add three flour, baking soda, and salt into the bowl.
Add the Skittles candies and stir.
Using a spoon, drop the cookies on a cookie sheet.
Let it bake for about 10 to 12 minutes, or until golden brown.

text: Preheat your oven to 375 °F (191 °C).  Cream the butter, sugar, vanilla and eggs in a bowl. Mix well until mixture is beaten until creamy. Add three flour, baking soda, and salt into the bowl. Blend well. Add the Skittles candies and stir.  Using a spoon, drop the cookies on a cookie sheet.  Let it bake for about 10 to 12 minutes, or until golden brown. Have it cool. Enjoy!
